channel.title: Runescape (An idea)
channel.description:
I have had an Idea to work on a new skill and add it to my Rsps I need the most brilliant java developers and coders Moparscape has to offer so please if you want to work on this message me. The work will start on the 15th of June 2013, we will be using Zenithscape 728 as a base. The skill we will be trying to add will be Enchanting and if you want all the information on how it will work please feel free to message me also my skype name is frost.rsrevamped
Thank you for your time Regards, Frost

item.title: Runescape (An idea)
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

Ruby:

You need the best programmers MoparScape has to offer, yet you aren’t writing your own framework?

^

ZenithScape? Really?..
If you want MoparScapes most brilliant Java developers to help you, then I suggest you to make you’re own (742) framework. I’m 100% sure that they don’t want to help you coding a 667/728 RSPS.

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/downloads/465608-742-skeleton.html

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape (An idea)
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

You need the best programmers MoparScape has to offer, yet you aren’t writing your own framework? Does not compute. Would also help if you posted this in the right board.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape (An idea)
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

I’ll do it but I’ll need a “java for beginers” book, preperation-h and a q-tip.

Read full topic
